title: Suspender, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, leather
Technique: counted stitch embroidery
description: Pair of suspenders of heavy silk mesh. Embroidered in colored silks in a vine design with small Chinese figures. Lined with magenta and white plaid taffeta. White leather straps and points to fashion to trousers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Suspender, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, leather
Technique: counted stitch embroidery. Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf. 1951-105-29-b.
